title: Bobby Contemplates Drinking Alcohol For First Time + Amy’s Son Bought Her An Apology Gift
itunes:title: Bobby Contemplates Drinking Alcohol For First Time + Amy’s Son Bought Her An Apology Gift
description:
Bobby has never had a sip of alcohol, but shares why he is contemplating drinking for the first time. Amy’s son apologized for his bad behavior with a gift. Aaron Watson stops by the studio. Also, the show asks Bobby questions about his current relationship status.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
